jp_text: もう 嫌

en_text:
Mugen no teromea ni
Engraved in the
boundless telomeres
jp_text: いや ふ んふ

en_text:
Honoo ni dakarenagara
Enveloped in flames
jp_text: 炎に抱かれながら

en_text:
Mezame no bohyou mezasu
Waiting for the awakening
jp_text: 醒(めざめ)の墓標 目指す
google_translated: Aim for the grave of awake

en_text:
Mogaki Wakare Yamiyo no yume
The life, the death,
the dream of darkness
jp_text: 生(もがき) 死(わかれ) 闇夜の夢
google_translated: Raw  Death  Darkness of the dark night

en_text:
Wakiagaru kibou utae
Sing for the hope
that gushes forth
jp_text: 湧きあがる希望 歌え！

en_text: ...spiraling down and down.
jp_text: 渦巻く 廻る

en_text:
Something beyond
the form of a human.
jp_text: 後ろの正面

en_text: Who's behind me?
jp_text: 後ろはだあれ？

en_text: Who are you?
jp_text: あなたはだあれ？
